page.title: 10Life Styles in Northill
page.content: Freezers, food processors, dishwashers & microwave ovens are becoming widely owned in the area, with refrigerators, washing machines & vacuum cleaners the norm. Modern{domestic appliances}have removed the need for a mammoth annual Spring clean, a vital factor in homes where both partners work, although some{domestic help}may be employed.The population in the area is generally affluent, with few cases of hardship compared with other parts of Britain. Much{home hospitality}is extended. Many enjoy theatre or concert trips, two cars, private education, and holidays abroad and at home. Worthy charities and local ventures are given support and{companionship}found at the Tea Room, 'The Crown' public house and the Ickwell Cricket Club. The majority find the area friendly, and appreciate the{community spirit}which exists.
